role_dependencies: Installs NodeJS on nearly any OS
role_description: An Ansible role that installs nvm on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [NVM](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm) is a version manager for Node.js, designed to be installed per-user, and invoked per-shell. Please note that the Windows version uses a [seperate NVM project](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows).
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs nvm on nearly any platform.
